Gerard Clark Bond (a mụrụ ka ọnwa Mee di na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na abụọ, biri ndụ ya bido n'afọ1940 wee ruo ka ọnwa juun dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchi iri abụọ na iteolu n'afọ 2005) bụ onye America na-amụ banyere ala.
Bond nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị naCapital University dị na Columbus, Ohio, Ebe nna ya bụ Ralph Bond bụ ọka nkuzi na ihe ọmụmụ akpọrọ Geology

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na  Lamont–Doherty Earth Observatory in Palisades, New York dịka onyeisi nke ngalaba akpọrọ Deep-Sea Sample Repository, ka ọ kuzichara ntakịrị oge na Williams College nke dị na Williamstown, Massachusetts nakwa University of California, Davis

Bond kwuru na ọdịiche dị n' ọrụ anyanwụ na ọdịdị nke ntụpọ anyanwụ na mgbanwe na mmepụta nke ọchịcha ekpomọkụ anyanwụ nwere ike ịbụ na ọ na-akpali afọ otu puku na narịn ise nke mgbanwe dị ukwuu na ihu igwe ugwu n'oge glaciation ikpeazụ, na-akpata mmụba nke iceberg na-agbapụta site na Laurentide Ice Sheet n'ime oké osimiri North Atlantic, dị ka mgbanwe na petrology nke mkpụrụ a na-ewepụta site na okirikiri mmiri miri emi na-ekpuchi oge a

A na-ahụkwa cyclicity n'oge Holocene, ebe a na-akpọ ihe omume ndị ahụ ihe omume Bond.
E nyere Bond ihe nrite Maurice Ewing n'emume akpọrọ AGU Fall Meeting Honors Ceremony, na Disemba afọ 2003.
